name: Planet destroyer (itch) (Sajeg)
description:
This is my Game to the Three Button Jam. It's made with the Godot Engine. You can find the source code on Github.

How to play

  1. There are planets flying to their twins.
  2. But you need to destroy them as soon as you see the planets.
  3. To destroy them, press the number on the planet.

Assets

  • For the animation of the planets: https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack
  • For the planets: https://andelrodis.itch.io/solar-system-pack
  • For the background: https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator
  • For the soundfx: https://psionicgames.itch.io/my-game-sound-fx
